name: Maze.io - Snakes in a Maze!!
description:
Eat or be eaten! The world’s biggest multiplayer maze!

Play against other people online! Can you become the longest snake in the maze?!

Search for power-ups in the maze and use your 10 seconds wisely to try and eat other players! But watch out for other snakes with the power-up running into YOU - or you will turn into snake meat!

In Maze.io, you start small but you will soon learn to avoid other deadly snakes, find food and power-ups to grow to a giant snake!

100s of free skins to customize your snake! Find secrets in the maze and become the longest snake!
